Package gameSettings

Class Crop

java.lang.Object
gameSettings.Crop
public class Crop extends Object
Consists of variables and global state of the crop.

      type - The crop type
      waterNeeded - The water needed for the crop
      waterLimit - The water limit for the crop
      fertilizerNeeded - The fertilizer needed for the crop
      fertilizerLimit - The fertilizer limit for the crop
      harvestDay - The harvest day of the crop
      minProduced - The minimum produced of the crop
      maxProduced - The maximum produced of the crop
      isWithered - The crop is withered
      isHarvestable - The crop is ready to be harvested
